  1. …in reply to @dhavalgshah
    @dhavalgshah @tunetheweb font-display: swap is a fail safe imo. Fonts are about racing your font load against your first render. If you do it right, best case is that no one should see the shift—but worst case is still handled too. Also don’t forget font-display: optional!
